meaning_str.bing:
v. 害怕；担心；惧怕；担忧
n. 害怕；惧怕；担忧
网络. 恐惧；畏惧；恐惧术

恐惧；惧怕；（对不良后果的）担忧；忧虑；可能性；危险
害怕；惧怕；（引出不好的事情）恐怕；担心（某事发生）；担忧；忧虑；敬畏

sogou-kaoyan.n/v: 害怕; 恐惧[出现12次)];担忧[出现5次)];敬畏[出现0次)]

sogou-CET6.n/v: 害怕; 恐惧[出现20次)];担忧[出现6次)]

sogou-CET4.n/v: 害怕; 恐惧[出现17次)];担忧[出现6次)]

sogou-gaokao.n/v: 害怕; 恐惧[出现3次)];担忧[出现1次)]

1.en: In fear of losing his way, the little boy was looking back from time to time as he walked in the woods.
1.cn: 担心迷路，小男孩在树林里一边走，一边不时地回头看。

2.en: Taht's why the American President, Franklin Roosevelt, said: "The only thing we have to fear is fear itself. "
2.cn: 这就是为什么美国总统富兰克林。罗斯福说：“我们唯一需要害怕的就是害怕本身。”

3.en: In the hands gently pressed the shutter, the camera did not dare, for fear the desecration of such a quiet grace.
3.cn: 手中的相机不敢轻轻按下快门，怕亵渎了这种雍容沉静。

0.en: I used to have a fear of flying, but I got over it.
0.cn: 我曾经害怕飞行后来克服了。

1.en: Don't know who we can trust anymore. Do we? Trust, or fear? In your case, mostly fear.
1.cn: 我们是不是谁也不能信任了？你是信任我，还是怕我？你现在看起来感觉害怕多一些。

2.en: What you seek lies in front of you. As does what you fear.
2.cn: 你所寻找的就在你面前。你所害怕的也在那里。

3.en: What if I get caught? Fear of failure! Lack of confidence! Kind of a wuss!
3.cn: 万一被抓到怎么办？害怕失败！缺乏自信！有点怂逼！

4.en: My only fear is that I might awaken in my bed destined to live a common life once again.
4.cn: 我只害怕在睡梦中日渐虚弱，就这样庸庸碌碌地过完一生。

5.en: You're right to fear us. We are the future. We are the ones who will inherit this earth.
5.cn: 害怕我们，你是对的，我们就是未来，我们是世界的新继承者。

6.en: I've got to go back! We have work to do. Never fear. We'll have Alice fixed in no time.
6.cn: 我必须得回去！我们还有工作。别害怕，我们马上让爱丽丝安静下来。

7.en: This is beyond reason. We called for this parley in good faith. You called for this parley in fear.
7.cn: 这太不合理了，我们是真诚请求和谈的。你们请求和谈是因为害怕。

8.en: Actually you are one of the estimated seventy percent of the population has an intense fear of public speaking.
8.cn: 实际上，估计有70%的人害怕公开演说，你只是其中一位。

9.en: You tiny thing. In the face of the fabulous new, your only thought is to kill it? For fear of great change?
9.cn: 你这弱小的人类。遇到新事物，你就一心想着扼杀它？害怕发生巨变？

10.en: The cold air will trigger Leonard's asthma and it plays right into my well-known fear of getting flattened by a Zamboni.
10.cn: 冷空气会让莱纳德犯气喘，而且这正中我长久以来害怕被磨冰场车压扁的恐惧。

11.en: Tell me your name. You need not fear me. It is Judar, my Princess. You may call me Kokachin. No, Princess.
11.cn: 你叫什么，不用害怕我。我叫朱达尔，公主殿下。你可以叫我阔阔真。不能那么叫 ，公主殿下。

12.en: From a different country, a different religion, a different look. And our first reaction to the unknown has always been fear.
12.cn: 来自其它国家，有着不同的信仰，长着不一样的面孔。我们对于未知者的第一反应总是害怕。

13.en: You know what? I am tired of living in fear of this guy. I'm gonna go see him and finally say all the things I should have said in high school.
13.cn: 你知道吗？我受够了总是害怕这家伙了，我要去见他，然后把所有该在高中时告诉他的话都说出来。

14.en: I assumed as much, but never fear. Like the subordinate male protagonist in countless action movies who disappears half way through the second reel, I have returned to save the day.
14.cn: 我猜也是，但别害怕，就像是无数的动作片里面那些次要男主角在影片放到一半时消失那样，我现在回来拯救世界。

15.en: But you told me... What? What? What did I say? Well, you know, "don't let fear stop you from doing the thing you love." Ah, come... that's just a bunch of stupid, corny...
15.cn: 可是，可您说……说什么？我跟你说过什么？你跟我说，“不要因为害怕，就放弃自己喜欢的事”。那个啊，那是哄你玩的鬼话，随便一说。

16.cn: 战争。恐惧。恐惧，残忍，彻底的。

17.cn: 莱丽，你就克服你的恐惧吧。

18.en: Rocks have no fear. And they sink.
18.cn: 石头没有恐惧，但会沉下去。

19.en: We can work with fear. Yes, we can.
19.cn: 我们可以利用恐惧。是的，没错。
